metadata.title: Grosse Ochsendwand
metadata.subtitle: Via ferrata on the Grosse Ochsenwand

image.name: a_ochsensee.jpg
image.caption: The Grosse Ochsendwand from the Schlicker meadow (alm)

image.name: culpafolks.jpg
image.caption: Here you can see the party ahead of me climbing the route

image.name: verticallook.jpg
image.caption: There was a vertical ladder climb on the klettersteig

image.name: nearsumme.jpg
image.caption: The party ahead took this picture of me at the summit

image.name: coldtower.jpg
image.caption: The towers of the Ochsendwand reminded me of the Canadian Rockies

image.name: highcold.jpg
image.caption: The view from the summit, with snowy north faces

image.name: spookysnow.jpg
image.caption: I would have been terrified here without the fixed cable!

image.name: thewayahead.jpg
image.caption: The Road goes ever, ever on...

image.name: nearinnsbruck.jpg
image.caption: I think the town below is Zirl

image.name: lookwest.jpg
image.caption: More foothills of the Stubai Alps to the west

image.name: snowynorths.jpg
image.caption: North sides of the Stubai Alps

image.name: untilnexttime.jpg
image.caption: My pack waiting for me to come down from the ridge

page.content: Story to come, hopefully tomorrow? I'm trying to be better about these!
